trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制使用中的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A>集合，以建立在執行階段的 Group By 子句。

trans-unit.source: Typically you will not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A> collection to group data.
trans-unit.target: 通常您不使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A>來分組資料的集合。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A> collection only when a value in the Group By clause must be set at run time and that value is not a property name.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A>集合時，才在 Group By 子句中的值必須設定在執行階段，而且該值不是屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A> collection to group data based on whether the `LastName` property in the data records equals a value provided by the user.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A>來分組資料的集合，依據是否`LastName`資料記錄中的屬性值等於使用者所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: If you want to group data by a property and that property does not have to be set at run time, you can define the grouping property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果想要依屬性來群組資料，而且該屬性並沒有在執行階段設定，您可以定義在群組屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, to return values from a database table grouped by `LastName`, set <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A> to "LastName" without any parameters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要從資料庫資料表傳回值分組`LastName`，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A>至"LastName"，不含任何參數。

trans-unit.source: If you want to dynamically group data by a property, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event and customize the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A> property as needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要動態群組資料的屬性，建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件和自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A>所需的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You cannot assign the name of a property as the value for a parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您無法指派屬性的名稱做為中的參數值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You add parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A> collection when you want to add a condition to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A> property that must be set at run time.
trans-unit.target: 加入參數，以便<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A>集合，當您想要加入至條件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A>必須在執行階段設定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To set values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A> collection, you assign a name to each parameter and then add a placeholder in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A> property for that named parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在中設定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A>集合，您指派給每個參數的名稱，然後再新增中的預留位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A>名為參數的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In the Group By clause, preface each parameter name with the @ symbol.
trans-unit.target: 在 Group By 子句中，名稱的前面上每個參數使用 @ 符號。

trans-unit.source: The row values to be inserted into the data source.
trans-unit.target: 要插入資料來源的資料列值。

trans-unit.source: Performs an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 執行插入作業。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 插入作業所影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not have to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert%2A> method from your code.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您不必呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert%2A>從您的程式碼的方法。

trans-unit.source: The data-bound control will automatically call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert%2A> method when the user takes action to insert a new record.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項將會自動呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert%2A>方法，當使用者採取動作來插入新的記錄。

trans-unit.source: You explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert%2A> method when you want to create your own process for inserting data.
trans-unit.target: 明確地呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert%2A>方法，當您想要建立您自己的處理程序，用於插入資料。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to programmatically insert a new record in the data source after the user clicks a button.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何以程式設計方式插入新的記錄資料來源中，使用者按一下按鈕後。

trans-unit.source: The code passes a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary> object that contains default values to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在程式碼通過<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary>物件，其中包含預設值至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the markup for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示先前的範例標記。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an insert operation has finished.
trans-unit.target: 在插入作業完成時發生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserted> event to catch any exceptions from the insert operation or to examine the values after the insert operation has finished.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserted>事件攔截任何例外狀況的插入作業，或在插入作業完成之後，檢查的值。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the new values through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object that is passed to event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取到的新值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs>傳遞至事件處理常式的物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object to retrieve the identity property generated by a database for a new data record.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs>擷取新的資料記錄的資料庫所產生的識別屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserted> event that checks for exceptions and retrieves the identity property for the new record.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserted>事件，以檢查例外狀況，並擷取新記錄的 identity 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 在插入作業之前發生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting> event to validate the object to be inserted, to examine data validation errors from the data class, to change a value before the insert operation, or to cancel the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting>來驗證物件要插入、 檢查來自資料類別，以將值插入作業之前，變更或取消插入作業的資料驗證錯誤的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs> object passed to event handlers for this event contains the new object to insert in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，此事件報告功能包含要插入資料來源中的新物件。

trans-unit.source: If a validation error occurs during the insert operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs> object contains the validation exceptions that are thrown by the data class.
trans-unit.target: 如果在插入作業期間發生驗證錯誤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs>物件包含的資料類別所擲回驗證例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A validation error occurs if a value to be inserted does not match the type of the property in the data class, or if it does not pass a custom validation check.
trans-unit.target: 如果要插入的值不符合資料類別中屬性的型別或是它未通過自訂的驗證檢查，就會發生驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: In an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting> event, you can retrieve the validation exceptions and take appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: 中的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting>事件，您可以擷取驗證例外狀況並採取適當的動作。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown in an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting> event, you must handle the exception in that event handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件處理常式中擲回例外狀況<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting>事件，您必須處理該事件處理常式中的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The exception will not be passed to an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserted> event (through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object).
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況不會傳遞至事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserted>事件 (透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs>物件)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> property contains only the exceptions that are thrown after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性包含之後就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting> event that modifies data before the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting>修改資料之前插入作業的事件。

trans-unit.source: The object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs.NewObject%2A> property is cast to a type named `Product`.
trans-unit.target: 從物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs.NewObject%2A>屬性會轉型為類型，名為`Product`。

trans-unit.source: The `DateModified` property of the `Product` object is set to the current date and time.
trans-unit.target: `DateModified`屬性`Product`物件設定為目前的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting> event that retrieves validation exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting>擷取驗證例外狀況的事件。

trans-unit.source: The previous example retrieves validation exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 先前的範例會擷取驗證例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An exception might be thrown if a value does not match the type of the property.
trans-unit.target: 如果值不符合屬性類型，可能會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: It might also be thrown from a customized check such as the one in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 它可能也會擲回從自訂的檢查，如下列範例中的一個。

trans-unit.source: The `OnAgeChanging` method checks that the number for the `Age` property is not negative.
trans-unit.target: `OnAgeChanging`方法檢查數目`Age`屬性不可以是負數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得插入作業期間所使用的參數集合。

trans-unit.source: The parameters that are used during an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 插入作業期間所使用的參數。

trans-unit.source: Typically the values that are needed for an insert operation are passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control by the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 通常所需的插入作業的值會傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>資料繫結控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: You specify insert parameters when you want to provide a default value or define whether to convert empty values to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 您指定當您想要提供預設值時，插入參數值或定義是否將空值轉換為`null`。

trans-unit.source: You do not have to provide a parameter for every value that will be inserted, only for the values that must be handled when the user does not provide a value.
trans-unit.target: 您沒有提供參數的每個值會被插入，僅適用於使用者未提供值時，必須處理的值。

trans-unit.source: The values that you provide in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection are used only for fields that are defined in the data source but that are not bound in the data control.
trans-unit.target: 您在中提供的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合只用於資料來源中所定義，但未繫結資料控制項欄位。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose a database table has columns that are named Name, Address, and PostalCode, but a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control that is bound to the table is bound only to the Name and Address fields.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設資料庫資料表資料行名稱、 地址和郵遞區號，名為但<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>繫結至資料表的控制項繫結名稱和地址欄位。

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection will be used only for the PostalCode field.
trans-unit.target: 中的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合將只能用於 [郵遞區號] 欄位。

trans-unit.source: They will not be used for the Name and Address field.
trans-unit.target: 它們不使用名稱和地址欄位。

trans-unit.source: This is true even if no value is entered for those fields.
trans-unit.target: 即使未輸入任何值，這些欄位也是如此。

trans-unit.source: If the data-bound control autogenerates fields for all fields in the data source, no values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料中的所有欄位的資料繫結控制項的自動產生欄位來源，從任何值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>將用於集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control with a parameter that provides a default value in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>提供中的預設值的參數控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If the user does not provide a value for the `Category` property, the default value that is provided by the parameter is saved in the database.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者未提供的值`Category`屬性，預設值所提供的參數儲存在資料庫中。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies which fields are used for ordering the retrieved data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指定用於對擷取之資料進行排序的欄位。

trans-unit.source: A string that is used to create the Order By clause.
trans-unit.target: 字串，用來建立 Order By 子句。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property to specify which properties from the returned data to use for sorting.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A>屬性來指定從傳回的資料，用來排序的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property for sorting the data must exist in the original data source, but it does not have to be included in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 排序資料的屬性必須存在於原始資料來源，但是並沒有包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can add a space and `Ascending`, `ASC`, `Descending`, or `DESC` to a property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A> string in order to specify how the ordered data is returned.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入一個空格和`Ascending`， `ASC`， `Descending`，或`DESC`中的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A>字串來指定如何傳回已排序的資料。

trans-unit.source: You can provide more than one property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property by separating each property by using a comma.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提供多個屬性在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A>使用逗號分隔每一個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, to order by properties named `LastName` and `FirstName`, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property to "LastName, FirstName".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要依屬性名為`LastName`和`FirstName`，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A>"LastName FirstName"的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control with [!INCLUDE[ss2k](~/includes/ss2k-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[ssEW](~/includes/ssew-md.md)] and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A> property is set to `true`, you must provide a value in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>用來控制[!INCLUDE[ss2k](~/includes/ss2k-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[ssEW](~/includes/ssew-md.md)]和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A>屬性設定為`true`，您必須提供值，以在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you assign a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property, you must also include all identity columns in the list of properties that is returned in the query.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指派值給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性，您必須也包含所有 identity 資料行中傳回查詢中的屬性清單。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A> property is set to `true`, a data-bound control can pass a sort expression to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A>屬性設定為`true`，資料繫結控制項可以將排序運算式，以傳遞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control will apply the sort expression from the data-bound control after it applies the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項將套用從資料繫結控制項的排序運算式之後套用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the data is returned according to the sort expression from the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 因此，資料會根據排序運算式傳回的資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example returns data in reverse alphabetical order based on values in the `Category` property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會傳回資料，以根據值的反向字母順序`Category`屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the Order By clause.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於建立 Order By 子句的參數集合。

trans-unit.source: The parameters that are used for creating the Order By clause.
trans-unit.target: 用於建立 Order By 子句的參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control uses parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> collection to create the Order By clause at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制使用中的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>集合，以在執行階段建立 Order By 子句。

trans-unit.source: Typically you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> property to `true` when you add parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 通常您會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>屬性`true`當您將參數加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> property is set to `true`, each parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> collection is added to the Order By clause in the sequence that they are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>屬性設定為`true`，在每個參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>集合加入 Order By 子句中指定的順序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> property is `true`, the parameters do not have to be named because they are applied in sequence and are not matched to a placeholder.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>屬性是`true`，不需要參數，所以它們會依序套用和不相符的預留位置來命名。

trans-unit.source: If you do not have to set a value at run time in the Order By clause, you do not have to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要在 Order By 子句中的執行階段設定值，您不必使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can define the fields to use for ordering the data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定義要用於排序中的資料欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, to return values from a database table ordered by `LastName`, set <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A> to "LastName" without any parameters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要從資料庫資料表傳回值依`LastName`，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A>至"LastName"，不含任何參數。

trans-unit.source: You can set parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> collection and match the parameters to placeholders in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property, but this approach has limited application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 設定參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>集合，而且符合中預留位置的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderBy%2A>屬性，但是這種方法具有有限的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: When you use this approach, the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> collection cannot represent a column name.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用這種方法中的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>集合無法表示資料行名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can set a parameter to a value and then compare that value to values in a property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定參數的值，然後進行比較值屬性中的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can order the data based on whether the values in a property are less than the run-time value represented by the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以排序依據屬性中的值是否小於參數代表的執行階段值的資料。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示將 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> 屬性設定為 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> 的 `true` 控制項。

trans-unit.source: A parameter is included in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> collection that orders the data based on the property name that a user selects from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 參數包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>集合來排序屬性為基礎的資料名稱的使用者會從選取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the fields that are used for ordering grouped data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於排序分組資料的欄位。

trans-unit.source: A string that is used to create the Order Groups By clause.
trans-unit.target: 字串，用來建立的順序群組 By 子句。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A> property to specify how the groups of data are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A>屬性來指定如何排序資料的群組。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can group by the `CategoryID` property and then sort each category ID group by the average of the `Price` property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以依分組`CategoryID`屬性，然後排序每個類別目錄識別碼分組的平均`Price`屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A> property only when you have grouped the data.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A>屬性只有在已分組的資料時。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A> property without setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A>屬性未設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The property that is used to sort the data must be either a property that is used to group the data, or the result of an aggregation function on the grouped data.
trans-unit.target: 用來排序資料的屬性必須為此屬性，用來分組資料或在群組資料的彙總函式的結果。

trans-unit.source: To specify how the data is sorted, you can add a space and the string "Ascending", "ASC", "Descending", or "DESC" to a property name in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A> string.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定資料的排序方式，加入一個空格和字串"Ascending"、"ASC 」、 「 遞減 」 或"DESC"中的屬性名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A>字串。

trans-unit.source: You can specify more than one property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定多個屬性在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Separate each property by using a comma.
trans-unit.target: 使用逗號分隔每一個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to group the data by using two properties, and how to sort the grouped data by using one of those properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何群組資料，使用兩個屬性，以及如何使用其中一個屬性來排序群組的資料。

trans-unit.source: The data from a table named `Products` is grouped by using properties named `CategoryID` and `Discontinued`.
trans-unit.target: 從名為資料表資料`Products`使用名為的屬性分組`CategoryID`和`Discontinued`。

trans-unit.source: The grouped data is sorted by the `CategoryID` property.
trans-unit.target: 群組的資料依照`CategoryID`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to group the data by using a property, and how to sort it based on the results of an aggregation function.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，來群組資料以及如何排序會根據彙總函式的結果。

trans-unit.source: The data from the `Products` table is grouped by using the `CategoryID` property.
trans-unit.target: 從資料`Products`資料表會依使用`CategoryID`屬性。

trans-unit.source: It is sorted based on the average of the `UnitPrice` property within each group.
trans-unit.target: 排序依據的平均`UnitPrice`每個群組內的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the Order Groups By clause.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來建立 Order Groups By 子句的參數集合。

trans-unit.source: The parameters that are used to create the Order Groups By clause.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立的順序群組 By 子句的參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control uses parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A> collection to create the Order Groups By clause at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制使用中的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A>集合，以在執行階段建立的順序群組 By 子句。

trans-unit.source: You add values to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A> collection only when you must set values at run time in the Order Groups By clause.
trans-unit.target: 您新增值以<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A>只有當您必須在群組 By 子句中的執行階段設定值的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can define the fields that are used to order the data by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定義用來排序資料所使用的欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can set parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A> collection and match the parameters to placeholders in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 設定參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A>集合，而且符合中預留位置的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, when you use this approach, the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A> collection cannot represent a column name; they must represent values.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當您使用這種方法中的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A>集合無法表示資料行名稱，則還必須有值。

trans-unit.source: You can set a parameter to a value and then compare that value to a property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定參數的值，然後進行比較的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can order the data based on whether the values in a property are less than the run-time value represented by the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以排序依據屬性中的值是否小於參數代表的執行階段值的資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the properties and calculated values that are included in the retrieved data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性以及擷取之資料中包含的計算值。

trans-unit.source: A string that is used to create the Select clause.
trans-unit.target: 用於建立 Select 子句的字串。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control retrieves all the properties (data columns) from the data object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制從資料物件擷取所有的屬性 （資料行）。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property to retrieve a subset of properties from the object or to calculate new values when the data is being retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性從物件擷取屬性的子集，或擷取資料時計算新的值。

trans-unit.source: You specify which properties to retrieve by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property to the names of the properties that you want to include in the returned data.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的屬性來擷取設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>至您想要傳回的資料中包含的屬性名稱的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you retrieve a subset of properties from the data object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control dynamically creates a class that contains only the properties that you specify in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您從資料物件擷取屬性的子集<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項會以動態方式建立僅包含屬性中所指定的類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A class is also created dynamically if you calculate properties that are not properties in the data object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要計算不是屬性中的資料物件的屬性，也會動態建立類別。

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the object returned from the query is not an instance of the class that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下，從查詢傳回的物件不是類別中所指定的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you must use the `new` method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property to indicate that a new class is returned from the query.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您必須使用`new`方法中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性，指出新的類別從查詢傳回。

trans-unit.source: For example, to return only the `FirstName` and `LastName` properties from an object that contains more than these properties, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property to `new(FirstName, LastName)`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要只傳回`FirstName`和`LastName`屬性從物件，包含多個這些屬性，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性`new(FirstName, LastName)`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control will dynamically create the new class that you specified in the `new` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項將以動態方式建立新的類別中所指定`new`方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `As` keyword to assign an alias to a selected value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用`As`關鍵字來指派別名給選取的值。

trans-unit.source: If you assign an alias, you must include the aliased properties in the `new` method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定別名，您必須包含中的別名屬性`new`方法。

trans-unit.source: Any data-bound control that binds to the results from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control must refer to the property by the alias.
trans-unit.target: 將繫結至結果的任何資料繫結控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項必須別名所參考的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property to `new(Region As SalesRegion, Revenue / 1000 As RevenueThousands)`, the data-bound control can access two properties, `SalesRegion` and `RevenueThousands`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性`new(Region As SalesRegion, Revenue / 1000 As RevenueThousands)`，資料繫結控制項可以存取兩個屬性：`SalesRegion`和`RevenueThousands`。

trans-unit.source: You use the `new` function in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property according to the conditions listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 您使用`new`函式在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>下表列出根據之條件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Select
trans-unit.target: 選用版

trans-unit.source: Use of new
trans-unit.target: 使用新的

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Single property.
trans-unit.target: 單一屬性。

trans-unit.source: `new` not needed.
trans-unit.target: `new` 不需要。

trans-unit.source: Multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: 多個屬性。

trans-unit.source: `new` needed.
trans-unit.target: `new` 所需。

trans-unit.source: Single or multiple properties that have an alias.
trans-unit.target: 單一或多個有別名的屬性。

trans-unit.source: `new` needed.
trans-unit.target: `new` 所需。

trans-unit.source: If you want to enable automatic data modifications, but you do not want to display all the properties from the data object, do not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要啟用自動的資料修改，但不是想顯示從資料物件的所有屬性，就不要設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead, manage the display through the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 請改用管理透過資料繫結控制項的顯示。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項，您也必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Any values that are not displayed in the data-bound control are stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 不會顯示在資料繫結控制項的任何值會儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: They are passed unchanged to the data source when the data update is performed.
trans-unit.target: 它們會原封不動地傳遞至資料來源時執行資料更新。

trans-unit.source: When you group data in the query, you can include aggregate methods in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 分組資料的查詢中，您可以包含在彙總方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the following aggregate methods:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列的彙總方法：

trans-unit.source: `Average(` *column* `)`
trans-unit.target: `Average(` *column* `)`

trans-unit.source: `Sum(` *column* `)`
trans-unit.target: `Sum(` *column* `)`

trans-unit.source: `Max(` *column* `)`
trans-unit.target: `Max(` *column* `)`

trans-unit.source: `Min(` *column* `)`
trans-unit.target: `Min(` *column* `)`

trans-unit.source: `Where(` *condition* `)`
trans-unit.target: `Where(` *條件* `)`

trans-unit.source: `All(` *condition* `)`

For more information, see [NIB: LinqDataSource Web Server Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/104cfc3f-7385-47d3-8a51-830dfa791136) and [How to: Group and Aggregate Data Using the LinqDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b922cf69-251f-4158-b405-ea960993a1af).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB: LinqDataSource Web 伺服器控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/104cfc3f-7385-47d3-8a51-830dfa791136)和[How to： 群組和彙總的資料使用 LinqDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b922cf69-251f-4158-b405-ea960993a1af)。

trans-unit.source: When you group data, you can include `Key` and `It`, which are dynamically created properties, in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 分組資料，您可以包含`Key`和`It`，其中中動態建立屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `Key` property refers to the values in the property or properties that were used to group the data.
trans-unit.target: `Key`屬性表示用來將資料分組，一個或多個屬性值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you group by a property named `Category`, the `Key` property will contain each unique value in the `Category` property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您依屬性分組`Category`、`Key`屬性會包含在每個唯一值`Category`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `It` property refers to a collection of individual records in a grouping of data.
trans-unit.target: `It`屬性參考到資料群組中個別記錄的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can iterate over the `It` property to retrieve the individual records that have been consolidated in the grouping operation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以反覆`It`屬性，以擷取已在群組作業中彙總的個別記錄。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you group by a property named `Category`, the `It` property contains all the individual records that share a common value in the `Category` property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您依屬性分組`Category`、`It`屬性包含共用共通的值中的所有個別記錄`Category`屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you include the `It` keyword in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property when you group data, you must assign an alias to the `It` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 如果您包含`It`關鍵字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性將資料分組時，您必須指派別名`It`關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control will throw an exception if `It` does not have an alias.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項將會擲回例外狀況，如果`It`沒有別名。

trans-unit.source: You can assign an alias to the `Key` keyword, but this is not required.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指派別名`Key`關鍵字，但這不是必要。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property to a subset of properties in the data object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>資料物件中的屬性子集的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve values in a property that has been used to group data, and to retrieve the average for the grouped records.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何擷取已用來群組資料的屬性中的值，以及擷取群組的記錄的平均值。

trans-unit.source: The `Key` keyword contains the property that has been used for grouping data.
trans-unit.target: `Key`關鍵字包含用於分組資料的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, `Key` will contain the shared values from the `ProductCategory` property.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，`Key`將包含共用的值從`ProductCategory`屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a data retrieval operation has finished.
trans-unit.target: 在資料擷取作業完成時發生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selected> event to catch any exceptions from the data retrieval operation or to examine the data object after the retrieval operation has finished.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selected>事件來攔截任何例外狀況，從資料擷取作業或擷取作業完成之後，檢查資料物件。

trans-unit.source: The object is available from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object that is passed to event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 物件是可從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs>傳遞至事件處理常式的物件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a data-retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 在資料擷取作業之前發生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event in order to perform the following tasks:
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件才能執行下列工作：

trans-unit.source: Modify parameters for data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: 修改參數來擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: Generate the query programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計方式產生查詢。

trans-unit.source: Modify the values for sorting or paging.
trans-unit.target: 修改用於排序或分頁的值。

trans-unit.source: Perform custom sorting or paging.
trans-unit.target: 執行自訂排序或分頁。

trans-unit.source: Cancel the data-retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消資料擷取作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs> object that is passed to event handlers for this event contains the parameters for the data-retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>這個事件包含資料擷取作業的參數傳遞至事件處理常式的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event handler before the query executes, or you can create a new result set and assign that to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改中的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件處理常式之前執行的查詢，或您可以建立新的結果集，並將其指派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Your ability to implement custom sorting or paging in handlers for this event might be limited by the control that is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: 您實作自訂排序或分頁處理常式中，針對此事件可能會受到繫結至控制項的能力<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>。

trans-unit.source: For example, when the column header of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is clicked, the control performs automatic sorting which might override whatever order you establish in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當資料行標頭的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>按一下控制項時，控制項執行自動排序這可能會覆寫任何排序您建立在事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown in an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event, you must handle the exception in that event handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件處理常式中擲回例外狀況<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件，您必須處理該事件處理常式中的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The exception will not be passed to an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selected> event (through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object).
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況不會傳遞至事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selected>事件 (透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs>物件)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> property contains only the exceptions that are thrown after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性包含之後就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件。

trans-unit.source: The handler creates a query that retrieves values from an array of string values in the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 此處理常式會建立查詢來擷取 Web 網頁中的字串值的陣列中的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to assign the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A> property to the object that is returned from a method that represents a stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何指派<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A>屬性來從表示預存程序的方法傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during a data-retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得擷取資料作業期間所使用的參數集合。

trans-unit.source: The parameters that are used to create the Select clause.
trans-unit.target: 用於建立 Select 子句的參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control uses parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> collection to create the Select clause at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制使用中的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>集合，以在執行階段建立 Select 子句。

trans-unit.source: You add parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> collection when you want to use run-time values in the Select clause.
trans-unit.target: 加入參數，以便<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>集合，當您想要在 Select 子句中使用執行階段值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can add a parameter to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> collection to represent a property in the user's profile.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以在其中加入參數來<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>來代表使用者的設定檔中的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: You can then use that property and a value from the data source to calculate a new value.
trans-unit.target: 您接著可以來計算新值從資料來源使用該屬性和值。

trans-unit.source: If you do not have to set a value at run time in the Select clause, you do not have to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要在 Select 子句中的執行階段設定值，您不必使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can define the properties to retrieve in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定義要在擷取的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, to return the `FirstName` and `LastName` values from a database table, set <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> to "FirstName, LastName" without any parameters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要傳回`FirstName`和`LastName`值從資料庫資料表時，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>"FirstName，LastName"以不含任何參數。

trans-unit.source: To set values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> collection, you add a placeholder in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property for the named parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定值，在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>集合，您加入內某個預留位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性，為具名參數。

trans-unit.source: In the Select clause, preface each parameter name with the @ symbol.
trans-unit.target: 在 Select 子句中，名稱的前面上每個參數使用 @ 符號。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use a parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> collection to represent a property name.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用中的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>來代表屬性名稱的集合。

trans-unit.source: To dynamically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property to the name of a property, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event and customize the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property as needed.
trans-unit.target: 若要動態方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性名稱的屬性，建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件和自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>所需的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a user-supplied value to calculate a value in the returned data.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用使用者提供的值來計算值中傳回的資料。

trans-unit.source: The user can enter a value in the text box that represents the number of manufacturing days.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以輸入值，在文字方塊中的製造天數表示。

trans-unit.source: That value is divided by a value from a database that represents the number of days to manufacture a product.
trans-unit.target: 該值會除以代表數天來製造產品的資料庫中的值。

trans-unit.source: The returned value indicates how many products can be manufactured during the specified number of days.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值，表示在指定天數期間可以製造的產品。

trans-unit.source: The user's input is included in the Select command through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用者的輸入透過選取命令中包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data from the data source should be stored in view state to make sure that the data has not been changed by another process before it is updated or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示資料來源的資料是否應在檢視狀態中進行儲存，以確定在更新或刪除資料前，資料未由另一個處理序變更。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the values will be stored in view state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在檢視狀態中儲存值則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, when update and delete operations have been enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control stores the original values for all the records in view state.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，當更新和刪除作業已啟用，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制會儲存原始值的所有資料錄檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control stores values for all primary keys and all properties not marked with `UpdateCheck.Never` in the `Column` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項儲存的所有主索引鍵的值和所有屬性未都標記為`UpdateCheck.Never`中`Column`屬性。

trans-unit.source: You set the `UpdateCheck` property of the `Column` attribute in the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 您設定`UpdateCheck`屬性`Column`屬性[!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Before LINQ to SQL updates or deletes data, it checks the values in view state against the current values in the data source.
trans-unit.target: LINQ to SQL 更新或刪除資料之前，它會檢查在檢視狀態資料來源中的目前值的值。

trans-unit.source: If the values do not match, the data source record has changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果值不相符，已變更的資料來源記錄。

trans-unit.source: In that case, LINQ to SQL throws an exception and does not continue with the update or delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，LINQ to SQL 會擲回例外狀況並不繼續更新或刪除作業。

trans-unit.source: For more information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 LINQ to SQL 的詳細資訊，請參閱[LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。

trans-unit.source: Storing the original values in view state can cause the page size to become unnecessarily large and can expose sensitive data to a malicious user.
trans-unit.target: 在檢視中儲存原始值狀態可能會造成頁面大小變得過大，而且可以公開給惡意使用者的機密資料。

trans-unit.source: You can disable storing values in view state by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.StoreOriginalValuesInViewState%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以停用儲存檢視狀態中的值，藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.StoreOriginalValuesInViewState%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: If you do this, you must provide your own way to make sure that the data has not changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您這樣做，您必須提供自己的方法來確保資料未變更。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.StoreOriginalValuesInViewState%2A> property to `false`, the original values are not persisted in view state for the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.StoreOriginalValuesInViewState%2A>屬性`false`，原始的值不會保存在資料繫結控制項的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: In that case, LINQ to SQL cannot verify the integrity of the data.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，LINQ to SQL 無法驗證資料的完整性。

trans-unit.source: LINQ to SQL will throw an exception that indicates a data conflict even if the data in the data source has not actually changed.
trans-unit.target: LINQ to SQL 將會擲回例外狀況，指出資料衝突，即使資料來源中的資料實際變更。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying data source contains a timestamp field that is automatically updated during an update, you can store only that value in view state.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎資料來源包含時間戳記欄位會自動更新更新期間，您可以儲存只有在檢視狀態中的值。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the timestamp property in the entity class is set to `IsVersion=true` and all the properties are set to `UpdateCheck.Never`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，實體類別中的時間戳記屬性設定為`IsVersion=true`和所有屬性都會都設為`UpdateCheck.Never`。

trans-unit.source: Because a timestamp field is automatically updated by the database every time that data in that record changes, LINQ to SQL determines from that value if data has changed.
trans-unit.target: 因為每次在該記錄中資料的變更時，時間戳記欄位會自動更新資料庫，LINQ to SQL 決定從該值時，資料已經變更。

trans-unit.source: This helps reduce the size of view state, and no sensitive data is exposed.
trans-unit.target: 這有助於減少檢視狀態的大小，而會公開任何機密資料。

trans-unit.source: LINQ to SQL will check for data consistency by comparing the timestamp value in view state with the timestamp value in the database.
trans-unit.target: LINQ to SQL 會檢查資料的一致性藉由比較時間戳記值在檢視狀態，且在資料庫中的時間戳記值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Using a Timestamp with the LinqDataSource Control to Check Data Integrity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7700162-4f05-4130-81f7-3be1361027fa).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 使用時間戳記與檢查資料完整性 LinqDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7700162-4f05-4130-81f7-3be1361027fa)。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The type that is associated with the class.
trans-unit.target: 與此類別關聯的型別。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the entity.
trans-unit.target: 實體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the property or field in the data context class that represents a data collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料內容類別中屬性或欄位的名稱，這個類別表示資料集合。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the property that contains the data collection.
trans-unit.target: 包含屬性名稱的字串，該屬性包含資料集合。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property to the name of the property or field that represents the data that you want to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>屬性名稱的屬性或欄位，表示您想要擷取的資料。

trans-unit.source: When you are connecting to a database table, the name of the property is usually the same as the name of the table.
trans-unit.target: 當您要連接至資料庫資料表中時，屬性的名稱通常是資料表的名稱相同。

trans-unit.source: When you are connecting to an in-memory data collection, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property to the name of the property or field that returns the data collection.
trans-unit.target: 當您要連接到記憶體中的資料集合時，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>屬性的屬性或欄位，傳回資料集合的名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can assign a property that returns any type to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property for retrieval operations.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將傳回任何類型的屬性指派<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>擷取作業的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the object that is represented by the property does not implement <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control will automatically wrap the object in an instance of an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性所表示之物件未實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項自動包裝的執行個體中的物件<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>物件。

trans-unit.source: To enable automatic update, insert, or delete operations, the class that is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A> property must derive from <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext> and the property that is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property must derive from <xref:System.Data.Linq.Table%601>.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用自動更新、 插入或刪除作業，指派給類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A>屬性必須衍生自<xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext>和指派給屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>屬性必須衍生自<xref:System.Data.Linq.Table%601>。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to select data from an instance of a class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何從類別的執行個體中選取資料的資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: In one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property is set to a property in a class.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>屬性設定為類別中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: That property returns an array of strings.
trans-unit.target: 該屬性會傳回字串陣列。

trans-unit.source: In the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property is set to a property that represents a database table.
trans-unit.target: 在其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>屬性設定為代表資料庫資料表的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The class named `ExampleDataContext` that represents the database table is not shown in this example.
trans-unit.target: 名為的類別`ExampleDataContext`，代表資料庫資料表不會顯示在此範例中。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work, you must create this class by adding a LINQ to SQL class named Example.dbml and dragging a table named Movie onto the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 要讓範例能夠運作，您必須建立這個類別加入 LINQ to SQL 類別具名的 Example.dbml 並拖曳資料表名為電影到[!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: A class named `ExampleDataContext` with a property named `Movies` is generated.
trans-unit.target: 類別，名為`ExampleDataContext`與屬性，名為`Movies`產生。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the class named `MovieLibrary` that is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範名為的類別`MovieLibrary`，用來參考之<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The row key values for the records to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 要更新之資料錄的資料列索引鍵值。

trans-unit.source: The row values to be updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 要在資料來源中更新的資料列值。

trans-unit.source: The row values that are evaluated to detect data conflicts.
trans-unit.target: 評估以偵測資料衝突的資料列值。

trans-unit.source: Performs an update operation.
trans-unit.target: 執行更新作業。

trans-unit.source: The number of records affected by the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 更新作業所影響的資料錄數目。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not have to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update%2A> method from your code.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您不必呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update%2A>從您的程式碼的方法。

trans-unit.source: The data-bound control will automatically call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update%2A> method when the user takes action to update a record.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項將會自動呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update%2A>方法，當使用者採取動作來更新記錄。

trans-unit.source: You explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update%2A> method when you want to create your own process for updating data.
trans-unit.target: 明確地呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update%2A>方法，當您想要建立自己的程序來更新資料。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to programmatically update a record in the data source after the user clicks a button.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何以程式設計方式在使用者按一下按鈕後，更新資料來源中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The code passes a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary> object that contains the key value, a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary> object that contains the original values, and a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary> object that contains the new values to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在程式碼通過<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary>物件，其中包含的索引鍵值，<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary>物件，其中包含的原始值和<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary>物件，其中包含新的值來<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the markup for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示先前的範例標記。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an update operation has finished.
trans-unit.target: 在更新作業完成時發生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updated> event to catch any exceptions from the update operation or to examine the values of output parameters after the update operation has finished.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updated>事件來攔截任何例外狀況，從更新作業，或檢查的值更新作業完成之後，輸出參數。

trans-unit.source: The output parameters are available from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object that is passed to event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 輸出參數都是從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs>傳遞至事件處理常式的物件。

trans-unit.source: This collection is not used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource" /> 類別不使用這個集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 參數的集合。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before an update operation.
trans-unit.target: 在更新作業之前發生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating> event to validate the object to be updated, to examine data validation errors from the data class, to change a value before the update operation, or to cancel the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>來驗證物件更新，以檢查資料類別，來變更值，更新作業之前，或取消更新作業中的資料驗證錯誤的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs> object that is passed to event handlers contains both the original object and the updated object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs>傳遞至事件處理常式的物件包含的原始物件和更新的物件。

trans-unit.source: If a validation error occurs during the update operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs> object contains the validation exceptions that are thrown by the data class.
trans-unit.target: 如果在更新作業期間發生驗證錯誤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs>物件包含的資料類別所擲回驗證例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A validation error occurs if a value to be updated does not match the type of the property in the data class, or if it does not pass a custom validation check.
trans-unit.target: 如果要更新的值不符合資料類別中屬性的型別，或如果未通過自訂的驗證檢查，就會發生驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: In an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating> event, you can retrieve the validation exceptions and take appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: 中的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>事件，您可以擷取驗證例外狀況並採取適當的動作。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown in an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating> event, you must handle the exception in that event handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件處理常式中擲回例外狀況<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>事件，您必須處理該事件處理常式中的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The exception will not be passed to an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updated> event (through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object).
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況不會傳遞至事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updated>事件 (透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs>物件)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> property contains only the exceptions that are thrown after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性包含之後就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>事件。

trans-unit.source: The code compares properties from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs.OriginalObject%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs.NewObject%2A> property to see whether a value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會比較從屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs.OriginalObject%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs.NewObject%2A>屬性來查看是否已變更的值。

trans-unit.source: If the value has changed, a value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs.NewObject%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值已變更，值為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs.NewObject%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating> event that retrieves validation exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>擷取驗證例外狀況的事件。

trans-unit.source: The previous example retrieves validation exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 先前的範例會擷取驗證例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An exception might be thrown if a value does not match the type of the property.
trans-unit.target: 如果值不符合屬性類型，可能會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: It might also be thrown from a customized check such as the one in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 它可能也會擲回從自訂的檢查，如下列範例中的一個。

trans-unit.source: The `OnAgeChanging` method checks that the number for the `Age` property is not negative.
trans-unit.target: `OnAgeChanging`方法檢查數目`Age`屬性不可以是負數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies what conditions must be true for a record to be included in the retrieved data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指定針對要併入擷取之資料的資料錄，必須為 true 的條件。

trans-unit.source: A string that is used to create the Where clause.
trans-unit.target: 用於建立 Where 子句的字串。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> property to specify the conditions for the record to be returned from a query.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A>屬性來指定要從查詢傳回的資料錄的條件。

trans-unit.source: The syntax for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> property is the same as the syntax for a LINQ Where clause in C#.
trans-unit.target: 語法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A>屬性是 LINQ Where 子句在 C# 中的語法相同。

trans-unit.source: You specify an expression that results in a Boolean value, and if the expression evaluates to `true` for a given row, the row is included in the result set.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的運算式會產生布林值，如果運算式評估為`true`對於給定的資料列，將資料列納入結果集。

trans-unit.source: Expressions are composed of column names, comparison operators, and values to compare to, as shown in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 運算式所組成的資料行名稱、 比較運算子和值比較，如下列範例所示：

trans-unit.source: To specify multiple expressions linked by logical `AND` or `OR` operators, you use `&&` as a logical AND operator and `||` as a logical OR operator, as shown in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 若要指定多個運算式，由邏輯連結`AND`或`OR`運算子，您會使用`&&`當做邏輯 AND 運算子和`||`做為邏輯 OR 運算子，如下列範例所示：

trans-unit.source: If you want to test a property against a literal string value, the literal string value must be enclosed in double quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要測試對常值字串值的屬性，常值字串值必須括在雙引號中。

trans-unit.source: To do this in markup, enclose the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> clause value in single quotation marks, as shown in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 若要在標記中這樣做，請將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A>子句值以單引號，如下列範例所示：

trans-unit.source: To test against a literal string value in code, use escape characters that are appropriate to the language you are using in order to insert double quotation marks, as shown in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 若要測試程式碼中的常值字串值，請使用逸出字元，適合用來以插入雙引號括住，如下列範例所示所使用的語言：

trans-unit.source: If you want to test whether a string is greater than or less than another string, you must use methods of the <xref:System.String> class instead of using `<` or `>` operators between the column name and the string value.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要測試字串是否大於或小於另一個字串，您必須使用方法來<xref:System.String>類別，而不是使用`<`或`>`運算子的資料行名稱的字串值之間。

trans-unit.source: The following examples show how to select rows that have Category values that are less than, less than or equal to, greater than, or greater than or equal to "Sports":
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何選取資料列的類別值小於、 小於或等於大於，或大於或等於"運動":

trans-unit.source: You can also use other methods of the <xref:System.String> class, such as <xref:System.String.StartsWith%2A>, <xref:System.String.EndsWith%2A>, and <xref:System.String.Contains%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用其他方法的<xref:System.String>類別，例如<xref:System.String.StartsWith%2A>， <xref:System.String.EndsWith%2A>，和<xref:System.String.Contains%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to compare strings, see [Comparing Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/comparing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何比較字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[比較字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/comparing.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Where clause syntax, see [C# Operators](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0301e31f-22ad-49af-ac3c-d5eae7f0ac43) and [where clause](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/where-clause.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Where 子句語法，請參閱[C# 運算子](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0301e31f-22ad-49af-ac3c-d5eae7f0ac43)和[其中子句](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/where-clause.md)。

trans-unit.source: In addition to filtering based on static values that you define when you create the Web page, you can filter based on dynamic values that are evaluated at run time.
trans-unit.target: 除了篩選根據您定義當您建立網頁上的靜態值，您可以篩選在執行階段評估的根據動態值。

trans-unit.source: In that case, you include a named parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> property that acts as a placeholder for the value.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您可以包含中的具名的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A>做為預留位置，做為值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You then add a parameter that has the matching name to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 然後您加入具有相符名稱的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A> property to `true` and define the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A>屬性`true`定義中的參數和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A> property is `true`, you do not have to include the named parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A>屬性是`true`，沒有包含中的具名的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control automatically generates the Where clause from the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項自動產生 Where 子句中的參數從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to filter data, see [Walkthrough: Selecting and Filtering a Subset of Data with the LinqDataSource and GridView Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c1cca3e8-86e4-4e69-a29f-1c05b91f2205).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何篩選資料的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 選取和篩選以 LinqDataSource 和 GridView 控制項的資料子集](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c1cca3e8-86e4-4e69-a29f-1c05b91f2205)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to filter the data returned from a query based on a static condition.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何篩選查詢，根據靜態條件所傳回的資料。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to filter the data based on a value that is provided by the user at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何根據篩選資料由使用者在執行階段提供的值。

trans-unit.source: In this example a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control are displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>頁面上顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects one of the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control selects from the `Products` table only rows that have `UserPrice` values equal to the selected value.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者選取其中一個值在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項選取從`Products`資料表具有的資料列`UserPrice`值等於所選的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control then displays the filtered data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項接著會顯示篩選過的資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the Where clause.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於建立 Where 子句的參數集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the parameters that are used to create the Where clause in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 參數集合，用於在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where" /> 屬性中建立 Where 子句。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control uses parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> collection to create the Where clause at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制使用中的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A>集合，以建立 Where 子句，在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: You add parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> collection when you want to programmatically set one or more of the conditions in the Where clause.
trans-unit.target: 加入參數，以便<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A>集合，當您想要以程式設計方式設定一或多個條件，在 where 子句。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might search a database table for records with a last name equal to the value of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可能會搜尋資料庫資料表中記錄的值相等的姓氏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: In that case, you add a parameter to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> collection for the text box value.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您將參數加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A>文字方塊值的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you do not have to set a value at run time in the Where clause, you do not have to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有在執行階段設定值，在 where 子句中，您不必使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can define the fields to retrieve in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定義中所要擷取欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, to return values from a database table where `LastName` equals "Adams" in markup, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> property to `'LastName = "Adams"'` without any parameters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要從資料庫資料表傳回值其中`LastName`equals"Adams 」 在標記中，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A>屬性`'LastName = "Adams"'`不含任何參數。

trans-unit.source: To set values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> collection, you assign a name to each parameter and then add a placeholder in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> property for that parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定值，在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A>集合，您指派給每個參數的名稱，然後再新增中的預留位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A>該參數的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In the Where clause, preface each parameter name with the @ symbol.
trans-unit.target: 在 where 子句中，與每個參數名稱的前面上 @ 符號。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> collection to dynamically create the Where clause.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A>集合，以動態建立 Where 子句。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control returns all the records with a value in the `Price` column that is greater than the value selected by the user in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項會傳回值中的所有記錄`Price`大於中使用者所選取的值的資料行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制項。
